room_title: Escape room "The Train Heist Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
room_address: 513 Alta Mere Dr, Fort Worth, TX 76114
room_description:
There’s gold in that there train! You have been hired by an airship pilot to perform a daring high-speed heist, but this is no simple freight train.  This here iron horse is built to withstand the most cunning of bandits, with a gauntlet of security features designed to keep the likes of you out of there.

You and your crew need to get that gold—but will ALL of you make it out alive?
